Healing vials are used in Barbarian Assault by the Healer to heal teammates. It is made by getting an empty healing vial and taking it to the spring. The amount it heals varies by the healer level the player has.

Level Heals
1 10
2 15
3 20
4 25
5 35

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The game determines the healing amount of the vial based on the healer horn in a player's inventory. Without a healer horn, the vial heals 10 hitpoints.

'''Healing vials''' are used in [[Barbarian Assault]] by the [[Healer]] to heal teammates. It is made by getting an empty healing vial and taking it to the spring. The amount it heals varies by the healer level the player has.

{| class="wikitable"
!Level
!Heals
|-
|1
|10
|-
|2
|15
|-
|3
|20
|-
|4
|25
|-
|5
|35
|}

== Trivia ==
*The game determines the healing amount of the vial based on the [[healer horn]] in a player's inventory. Without a healer horn, the vial heals 10 hitpoints.
